Create a new document and add two new test cases
  • go to Documents & Wiki | Testing | Index and create a new document

  • Document name: "QA_Elibrary Test Specification". The document should contain test case work items and the prefix should be "QA".
  • Go to the Livedocs configuration to configure your new test specification

    • Set Fields at start to: id, outlineNumber
    • Set Content to: Title, Description and Test Steps
  • Status, Severity and Test Type should be shown in the document properties pane on the right side.

    If one of the fileds is missing you can add it by clicking on the gear icon.

    Hint: If the properties pane isn´t visible you have to click on the icon shown below:
